references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational work that the current research builds upon.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper significantly advances the field by providing a comprehensive analysis of the design space for diffusion models, improving efficiency and quality.

references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for diffusion models, connecting them to the principles of nonequilibrium thermodynamics.
This paper introduces the novel concept of parallel sampling which drastically speeds up the sampling process of diffusion models, which is a major focus of the current work.

references.paper_title: Noise-contrastive estimation: A new estimation principle for unnormalized statistical models
references.reason: This paper introduces noise-contrastive estimation, a technique used in the current paper to improve the training process of diffusion models by classifying different noise levels.
